Title: Prohibits the execution, garnishment or attachment of any federal or state stimulus check that is the result of a declared national or state disaster emergency
Summary: Prohibits the execution, garnishment or attachment of any federal or state stimulus check that is the result of a declared national or state disaster emergency; defines the term "stimulus check" shall mean any economic impact payment sent by the government to taxpayers to boost their spending power and spur economic activity.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to prohibiting the execution, garnishment or attachment of any federal or state stimulus check that is the result of a declared national or state disaster emergency
